column1: Smoque BBQ////I've had this place bookmarked for awhile and finally got the chance to go. For the few that are uninitiated
column3: wait for the host. You tell him/her how many people are in your party
column4: they note it down and looks for a table for you. You order your food
column5: said host shows you your table
column6: you wait for your order number to be called out
column7: and boom you're good to eat!
